summary: Unify WorkflowClient error handling by using a single Error type with Failure objects as causes, replacing the current approach of separate error classes for each workflow failure type.
userImpact: Users would have a simpler and more consistent error handling pattern for WorkflowClient operations, aligned with the Java SDK implementation.
rootCause: Separate error classes were implemented before failure classes were ported to the SDK, resulting in duplication of functionality.
proposedFix: Replace multiple error classes with a single Error class that includes a Failure class in its `cause` attribute, matching the Java SDK pattern.
resolutionDetails: Implemented unified error handling with single Error type and Failure cause attribute, aligning TypeScript SDK with Java SDK approach.
keyQuote: Unify these errors into a single Error class and add a Failure class to its `cause` attribute.
